MATERIAL TEST: GROUP - Geometrial Properties of Aggregates (Grading, FI - Flakiness Index, SI - Shape Index, SC - Shell Content and f - Fines Content)
GROUP - Physical Properties of Aggregates (LA - Resistance to fragmentation, SZ - Resistance to Impact, MDE - Resistance to Wear, AAV - Resistance to abrasion, Particle Density and Water Absorption)
GROUP - Chemical Properties (Water Soluble Chlorides, Acid Soluble Chlorides, Water Soluble Sulphates, Acid Soluble Sulphates, Humus Content and Presence of fulvo acids)
Preparation (Hand crushing of Aggregates to definate test sizes)
GROUP - Concrete Mix Design including basic testing of Fine Aggregates & Coarse Aggregates

GROUP - Physical & Chemical Properties of Steel Reinforcements (Tests include Dimension, Bending, Yield Strength, Tensile Strength, Elongation, Ductility, Carbon Content, Silicon Content, Manganese Content, Phosphorus Content & Sulphur Content)
GROUP - Atterberg Limits (Liquid Limit, Platic Limits & Linear Shrinkage)
GROUP - Foundation Indicator Tests (Moisture Content, PSD - Sieve Analysis & Atterberg Limits)
California Bearing Ratio - One Point Method
California Bearing Ratio - Three Points Method
Direct Shear (shearbox method on Remoulded samples)
Consolidated Undrained Triaxial compression with measurement of pore pressure
Consolidated drained Triaxial compression with measurement of volume change
Unconfined Compressive Strength of Stabilised Soils
GROUP - Basic Soil tests for Civil Engineering purposes (PSD - Sieve Analysis, Atterberg Limits, Compaction & 3 Points 4 days Soaked CBR)
